blockquote.span:
Welcome to Knox Community Schools!
Thanks for visiting our website at Knox Community Schools. Knox Community Schools provides educational opportunities for students in preschool through grade 12. As Superintendent, my goal for our staff is to be better at teaching our students tomorrow than we are today. I believe that you will find that the Knox Community School staff are passionate in wanting to help students learn and challenge them to do their best!
- Dr. William Reichhart
